Class Tokenizer

Tokenizer engine converting the source code to a tree of tokens (code fractions with their logical meanings, e.g. foreach - keyword

TokenizeRange(String, Int32, Int32, String)

Tokenizes the specified range of the source code according to the language rules. Tokenization settings are loaded automatically according to the language param.
